text: George Poe Wuerch (born 1936) is an American politician. He is a member of the Republican Party. He served as mayor of Anchorage, Alaska from 2000 to 2003. In the 2003 mayoral election, he lost reelection to former city assemblyman Mark Begich. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Anchorage, Alaska Category:Politicians from Tacoma, Washington Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: George Wuerch
